description: Try our easy to follow Megan's Triple-Choc Cheesecake Slice recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Megan's Triple-Choc Cheesecake Slice Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: When ready to serve, whip the remaining 150ml cream, spread over the chocolate filling and top with shaved chocolate. Cut into 24 pieces to serve.
